title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“The sound of snoring is due to vibration of the soft palate and the vulva at the back of the throat.” [From the Evening Times Globe of St. John, N.B., 1 October 1993. Submitted by Jon Simpson, Quispamsis, N.B.]
